title: Payment Links
description: Payment Link is a link-based payment solution that lets businesses collect payments through various payment methods.

title: B2B Services
description: We provide India's largest multi recharge platform. We work with domestic money transfer, international money transfer services, prepaid & Dth recharge, postpaid payments.

title: Wallets
description: PeUnique Wallet is a secure and convenient way to manage your payments, recharges, and transfers. We support multiple payment methods.
